pages.text: Rings of Ascension is a mod that uses the Trinkets API to add 20+ new rings to your minecraft. Each ring has its own special effect that is activated when the ring is equipped. Rings from this mod don't have a recipe and can only be found in specific locations. - Mod by Focomacho and PretoAlbino_
Grants fire resistance$(br2)Found in Nether Bridge chests, Ruined Portal chests, and Bastion Treasure
Grants dolphin's grace$(br2)Found in Underwater Ruins and Buried Treasure
Grants invisibility$(br2)Found in Abandoned Mineshaft and Buried Treasure
Grants jump boost$(br2)Found in End City, Igloo, and Desert Pyramids
Grants luck boost$(br2)Found in Simple Dungeon and Jungle Temples
Grants haste$(br2)Found in Simple Dungeon and Abandoned Mineshafts
Grants night vision$(br2)Found in Spawn Bonus Chest, Simple Dungeon, and Abandoned Mineshaft
Grants regeneration$(br2)Found in Strongholds
Grants slow falling$(br2)Found in Simple Dungeon, Buried Treasure, and End Cities
Grants speed for movement$(br2)Found in Spawn Bonus Chest, Simple Dungeon, and Buried Treasure
Grants strength$(br2)Found in Strongholds, Pillager Outpost, and Bastions
Grants strength$(br2)Found in Spawn Bonus Chest, Underwater Ruins, Buried Treasure
Grants immunity to slowness$(br2)Found in End Cities, Shipwrecks, and Bastions
Grants immunity to poison$(br2)Found in Jungle Temples End Cities, Shipwrecks, and Bastions
Grants immunity to wither effect$(br2)Found in Bastions
Pulls items to the player$(br2)Found in Spawn Bonus Chest, Simple Dungeons, Buried Treasure, and Ruined Portals
Grants creative flight$(br2)Found in End Cities
Keeps your food bar always full$(br2)Found in Village Butcher Chests, End Cities, and Woodland Mansion
Pulls nearby xp orbs$(br2)Found in Spawn Bonus Chest, Simple Dungeons, Buried Treasure, and Ruined Portals
Grows nearby crops faster$(br2)Found in Jungle Temples
+10 Knockback resistance$(br2)Found in End Cities, Nether Bridges, and Bastions
+20 Max Health or 10 extra hearts$(br2)Found in End Cities, Strongholds, and Bastions
Removes all nearby water blocks. Use with caution$(br2)Found in Underwater Ruins
Let's you walk on water$(br2)Found in Underwater Ruins and Buried Treasure
Works like a totem only reusable with a 600 second cooldown$(br2)Found in Woodland Mansions
